name: Senior Data Scientist/ML Engineer
description:
In Flatlogic, we create and sell templates for mobile and web applications. This is an existing market and we have a bunch of mature competitors, but we are growing in sales and traffic exponentially at an average of 10-20% per month.

Now we are looking for an experienced data scientist with the combination of business analysis skills and strong knowledge of data science methods, algorithms and tools to join a team developing a platform for aggregation, storage, search and visualization of real estate data.

A successful candidate will be able to come up with new ideas and solutions of how to use the existing dataset to enrich real estate data, create valuable prediction models, recommendation services, innovative search and visualization features.

You will be able to work remotely or at our office in Minsk.

Must have:

- Strong programming skills in Python and/or R

- Knowledge of modern statistical/ML/Predictive analytics tools

- Ability to understand the business domain and generate valuable ideas on how to use data, proactive attitude

- Experienced as a solution architect

- Fluent English, good communication skills and stress resistance

Nice to have:

- Experience in real estate, retail or similar domain
